channel.title: Fixeds on Jean Monlong
channel.description: Recent content in Fixeds on Jean Monlong

item.title: A draft human pangenome reference
item.description: Published in Nature. Press in English The NHGRI webpage and HPRC webpage compile links to the papers, news coverage, and multimedia material. Among others: Scientists have updated the human genome to make it more equitable and inclusive - CNN. A new, more diverse human genome offers hope for rare genetic diseases - The Washington Post. Scientists Unveil a More Diverse Human Genome - The New York Times.

item.title: Ultrarapid Nanopore Genome Sequencing in a Critical Care Setting
item.description: Published in New England Journal of Medicine. For this study, we set the Guinness World Record for fastest sequencing technique. We sequenced a patient and called variants (SNVs/indels/SVs) in five hours and two minutes. Image: Steve Fisch/Stanford University. Press Fastest DNA sequencing technique helps undiagnosed patients find answers in mere hours - Stanford Medicine News. Advancing genomics to better understand and treat disease - Google Blog.

item.title: Pangenomics enables genotyping of known structural variants in 5202 diverse genomes
item.description: Published in Science. Press A new way to find genetic variations removes bias from human genotyping - UCSC News. The benchmark for human diversity is based on one man’s genome. A new tool could change that. - Popular Science Novel tool can efficiently map new genome sequences to a “pangenome” - AZ Life Sciences Pangenomic Mapping Tool Betters Structural Variant Identification - GEN News

item.title: Single-cell RNA-seq reveals that glioblastoma recapitulates a normal neurodevelopmental hierarchy
item.description: Published in Nature Communications. Press Incursion inédite dans les tumeurs du cerveau - Québec Science Top Quebec discoveries of 2020 feature McGill brain cancer studies - The McGill Tribune scRNA-seq of glioblastoma complexity reveals its pattern of development - RNA-Seq Blog Deconstructing glioblastoma complexity reveals its pattern of development - McGill Press Release

item.title: Genotyping structural variants in pangenome graphs using the vg toolkit
item.description: Published in Genome Biology. Press Variant Detection Gets Boost From Graph Genomes, De Novo Assemblies - GenomeWeb

item.title: Stalled developmental programs at the root of pediatric brain tumors
item.description: Published in Nature Genetics. Press Origin of Childhood Brain Tumors Discovered - GEN News Researchers discover cellular origins of pediatric brain tumors - News Medical Life Sciences Incursion inédite dans les tumeurs du cerveau - Québec Science Cellular origins of pediatric brain tumors identified - McGill News

item.title: Genome-wide microhomologies enable precise template-free editing of biologically relevant deletion mutations
item.description: Published in Nature Communications. Press Transforming DNA repair errors into assets - Science Daily Transforming DNA repair errors into assets - Phys.org Transforming DNA repair errors into assets - Bioengineer.org

item.title: High Rate of Recurrent De Novo Mutations in Developmental and Epileptic Encephalopathies
item.description: Published in the American Journal of Human Genetics Press Eight New Epilepsy Genes Discovered - Neuroscience News Researchers discover eight new epilepsy genes - Medical Press
